amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part E of House Report 117-381 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 5, 9, 10, 13, 14, 15, and 16.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 comprised of amendments numbered 1, 5, 9, 10, 13, 14, 15, and 16, printed in Part E of House Report 117-381.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 387 - 32 (Roll no. 281).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Pallone.
